TopicTitle: Need help with a name for my part pack

Articles.Content:
I'm making a parts pack that are going to go with the stock I-beams to make them connect at different angles more "flush".

I want the acronym for the part pack to be B.I.T.S., but all I could think of was -Basic I-beam Technoogy- B.I.T.

Can I get some ideas for names that fit the acronym B.I.T.S.?

Here is a picture of the parts for reference, but no textures yet...

![6S6YlGO.png](http://i.imgur.com/6S6YlGO.png)

System, obviously

Basic. I-Beam. Technology. System.

> 
> System, obviously
> Basic. I-Beam. Technology. System.

 Thank you man I just could not think of something for S

> 
> Thank you man I just could not think of something for S

No problem, these look like they could be useful
